name: Fantastic Vet
description:
"In the Fantastic Forest, a lot of fantastic animals got problems ! As a veterinary, help them out by bringing them what they need !"

Fantastic Vet is a  single player prototype of an "Animal Care" game. In this game,, you will be able to collect 4 kind of animals: Unicorn, Dragon, Kitsune and Blob ! Each of them can spawn in 3 different biomes ! 

You'll have to give them what they need in order to make them feel better, and then, to let them return to the forest !

This prototype game was made during an exercice of Rapid Prototyping in which we got some constraints as:

  • The game has to be for a target between 5yo and 10yo.
  • The 3D ressources are limited to the primitives (Cube, Sphere, Cone, Capsule...)
  • The playtime have to be at least 20-30min.
  • Think the game as a Tablet Game (One input action / 1024 x 728)

The gameplay is entirely touch-based all you need to do is click to move, interact and/or harvest.

Collect !

-GIF

you will have to collect animals and then fetch what they will ask you ! So 

Help animals !
